Package it.polimi.ingsw.Listeners

Class Listener

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Listeners.Listener
Direct Known Subclasses:
ModelViewListener, ViewControllerListener
public abstract class Listener extends Object
represent a generic listener that works like an intermediary in a connection
